content: Water collector holder DD-HD30-WCH ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Used when coring on walls or overhead to fit a water collector system to a drill stand Water collector systems can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector holders Product information: Water collector holder for DD-HD 30 drill stand For use with: DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector holders | Product information | Water collector holder for DD-HD 30 drill stand | For use with | DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Additional Accessory Information | Water collector holder for DD-HD 30 drill stand ### ITEMS- 305536 - Water collector holder DD-HD30-WCH - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD-HD30-WCH Water collector holder assy
